resources.string: Browse through all of the latest BBCNews stories. Select an article to find out more information along with a link to the full article. If you select the star icon, the article will be added to your favorites.
BBC News reader uses the RSS form BBC www.bbc.com to display all of the latest news stories.

The Home page displays all of the current news articles. Clicking on one will bring you to a new page giving you more information about the article. On that page you will find a link to the full article on BBC News, a favorite button the shape of a heart, and a area to enter notes.
Both the article and notes you write will be saved to your favorites list once you click on the heart. You can of courser remove it from your favorites by clicking on the heart in you favorites.
